title: Online Visualization Design Research Methodology: Short-Term Course Integrating DSLM and Service-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Data Visualization Concepts and Practical Experience in Specialized Domains (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: Practical instructional design for professionals in BYOD environments, leveraging mobile devices for work-integrated learning

learning_goals: Learners can independently conduct small-scale visualization design research within a week using the DSLM framework
Learners can integrate visualization techniques into solving real-world professional problems by applying the service-learning (S-L) approach
Learners can compare and analyze three or more design research methodologies to select appropriate methods for online environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
